general: This law makes sure that taxi drivers are safe and trustworthy, so you can be too! It helps keep you and your family protected when you ride in a taxi or private car. The government wants to make sure everyone who drives these cars has gone through strict checks before they're allowed on the road. This means that only good people with clean records will be driving you around, keeping you and your loved ones safe while traveling.

The law creates a new database to store information about licensing decisions for these drivers, and allows licensing authorities to share information about drivers who have been reported for misconduct. Additionally, the law requires drivers to provide information about their criminal records before being licensed, and gives the government the power to make regulations and issue guidance to help implement the law.
